page.title: 16Education
page.content: At MR381955 is{Hawkwood Lodge Field {Study Centre }which organises courses for pupils in the secondary schools of Waltham Forest.The rich hinterland of Epping Forest,Lea Valley and nearby urban areas provide a stimulating resource for first-hand learning in the field.The Centre has its own small nature reserve with a pond supporting a rich and varied flora and fauna including populations of three amphibians{the Common Frog,Smooth Newt {and the rare Warty Newt. Close to the Centre is a primary school with special facilities for children with hearing difficulties.
